name: The Blood Sacrifices of Tower Moon
name_original: The Blood Sacrifices of Tower Moon
description:
Game jam entry, didn't have time to finish it so there's no ending. More of a concept piece 

~Controls~

Move: wasd

Turn: q and e

Quit: esc

Toggle Map: t

Interact: space

Battle: mouse 

Assets used: 

Image Glitch Tool, scroll amount, seed 50, iterations about 42, quality 80-99
